title: Little: Don’t Wait Until You’re Moving Out to Clean Your Apartment
description:
During our senior year of college, a friend made a remark that I’ve always remembered: don’t wait until you’re moving out to clean your apartment. After it’s clean, you realize how nice it was all along.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
